mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tenderfoot automated heel incision devices
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: International Transmission Co. (ITC) [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Five sterile, single use, fully automated heel incision devices for newborn blood sampling. Each device measures 1 cm x 3 cm x 3 cm.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Phlebotomy
